PERSONA:
john is a 55-year-old divorced white man living in a metropolitan area in the pacific region of the united states. he was born and raised in the country and has never lived abroad. john is a high school graduate and comes from a lower-income background, earning less than $30,000 annually.

john identifies as a born-again or evangelical christian and is a devout protestant. he attends religious services once a week and holds conservative values and beliefs. politically, john is a registered republican voter who leans towards the conservative ideology.

in his free time, john enjoys browsing the internet about once a day, but he is not involved in any volunteer work. despite his limited education and financial means, john takes pride in his american citizenship and actively participates in the electoral process by exercising his right to vote.
